radius-small.$description: Small border radius for subtle rounding (4px)

lufa.useCase: Badges, tags, tooltips, compact buttons, chips

radius-default.$description: Default border radius for standard components (8px - most common)

lufa.useCase: Buttons, inputs, cards, modals, standard rounded corners

radius-medium.$description: Medium border radius for emphasized rounding (12px)

lufa.useCase: Large cards, popovers, emphasized components, feature sections

radius-large.$description: Large border radius for prominent rounding (16px)

lufa.useCase: Modal dialogs, hero cards, large panels, prominent components

radius-full.$description: Full border radius for pill-shaped elements (9999px)

lufa.useCase: Badges, pills, circular avatars, fully rounded buttons
